column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba just catered my wedding over the weekend and I can't even begin to tell you how wonderful Alison Lowry and the staff that night were before
column3: and after the event. Throughout the entire process
column4: Alison was wonderful and extremely easy to work with. We met about the event once and everything after that was done via e-mail. Very convenient and she was very prompt with her responses. According to my other event organizers (since I was clearly busy ;))
column5: the Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba staff was prompt
column7: and just overall wonderful to work with. Unfortunately
column8: we did not get to eat
column9: but I assure you we will be going there soon on a date. According to our guests
column10: the food was just AMAZING! Everyone has been ranting and raving about it for the last few days.
